title: Thursday Arktoons
author: VD
content_html:
ALT★HERO Episode 75: The Madame

FAIRY DOOR Episode 24: Up the Bell Tower

CHATEAU GRIEF Episode 251: Pressure Luck

FLIP CITY CIRCUS Episode 5: The Woking Dead

CHUCK DIXON PRESENTS: ADVENTURE Episode 79: The Brigand

STONETOSS Episode 196: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Hearse

BEN GARRISON Episode 108: Elon Musk Bans Grrrgraphics

Stonetoss brings the heat, Dynamique is doing Dynamique things, and then there’s this from Twitter:

@GrrrGraphics
Account suspended
Twitter suspends accounts that violate the Twitter Rules.

It’s more than a bit ironic that Arktoons, which is absolutely not a free speech platform, nevertheless permits more of it than a platform which falsely proclaims itself to be one.

DISCUSS ON SG
